languages.text: "Ограничения в толковании Лекс Империалис — это поводок... Я давно перерос рамки системы и вижу ее изъяны..."
"Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash... I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws..."
languages.original_text: "Ограничения в толковании Лекс Империалис — это поводок... Я давно перерос рамки системы и вижу ее изъяны..."

traits.locale_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash... I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws..."
"Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash... I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws..."

"Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash... I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws..."

languages.text: "Enge Interpretationen des Lex Imperia sind eine Leine ... Ich habe mich längst über die Grenzen dieses Systems erhoben und erkenne seine Makel ..."
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash... I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws..."

traits.locale_text: "Enge Interpretationen des Lex Imperia sind eine Leine ... Ich habe mich längst über die Grenzen dieses Systems erhoben und erkenne seine Makel ..."

languages.text: « Les interprétations étriquées de la Lex Imperialis sont des œillères... Cela fait bien longtemps que je me suis affranchi de ces entraves et je perçois désormais les défauts de cette loi... »
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash... I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws..."

traits.locale_text: « Les interprétations étriquées de la Lex Imperialis sont des œillères... Cela fait bien longtemps que je me suis affranchi de ces entraves et je perçois désormais les défauts de cette loi... »

languages.text: “对帝国律法的狭隘解释是一种束缚……如今，我已经摆脱了这些束缚，也看到了这种解释的缺陷……”
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash... I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws..."

traits.locale_text: “对帝国律法的狭隘解释是一种束缚……如今，我已经摆脱了这些束缚，也看到了这种解释的缺陷……”

languages.text: «La interpretación literal de la Lex Imperialis es un yugo... Hace ya mucho que yo he trascendido los límites de este sistema, y veo claramente sus deficiencias...».
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash... I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws..."

traits.locale_text: «La interpretación literal de la Lex Imperialis es un yugo... Hace ya mucho que yo he trascendido los límites de este sistema, y veo claramente sus deficiencias...».

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアの狭義的な解釈など…『首輪』にすぎません。私はその枠組みをとうに超えており、すでにその欠陥が見えています」
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash... I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws..."

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリアの狭義的な解釈など…『首輪』にすぎません。私はその枠組みをとうに超えており、すでにその欠陥が見えています」

languages.text: "Lex İmperialis'in sığ yorumları, zayıf ve dar görüşlü... Ben bu sistemin sınırlarını çoktan aştım ve kusurlarını görebiliyorum..."
languages.original_text: "Narrow interpretations of the Lex Imperialis are a leash... I have long since outgrown the confines of this system, and I can see its flaws..."

traits.locale_text: "Lex İmperialis'in sığ yorumları, zayıf ve dar görüşlü... Ben bu sistemin sınırlarını çoktan aştım ve kusurlarını görebiliyorum...."
